Hello!

Welcome to my website. My name is Nikoletta Karidu. I was born in Greece but I am living all my life in Czech Republic. I like cooking, baking as you can see below, fitness and traveling.

When I was young I was studing and studing all the time at school. I was happy when I finished my bachelor's degree. I thought I wont have to learn anything for a long time. I could not be further from the truth. I stared to study networking in IT. 4 years later I started working with a group of people who are fulfilling their dreams and have big dreams and goals. I was wondering how the finance world works and about successful people.

So, I have never finished my studies. To be honest ... the end of the school was just a start :)

My passion and addiction

"It is so difficult to prepare really tasty food.", "I dont have time to cook.", "Healthy food is not good enough."

This is what I though years ago and what I hear these days. I realized I like to prepare food for others, come up with combinations, new recipes and discover new tastes.

I can't forget my former cats. We were living together about 5 years despite of my alergy ... I love them anyway
